<< cla Graphics functions clim >>

clf

Clear figure.

Syntax

clf
clf(f)
F = clf(...)

Input argument

f

a scalar graphics object on an existing figure.

Output argument

F

a graphics object: used figure graphics object.

Description

clf clears the current figure.

Example

f = figure();
x = linspace(0, 2*pi);
y = sin(3 * x);
plot(x, y)
sleep(5)
clf

See also

gcf, cla.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
